title: Smaller self-propelled forwarders
summary: A smaller self-propelled forwarder with an enclosed cab and a payload of at least 2 tonnes

eligible.eligibleBullet02: have an enclosed cab for roll over protection, operator protection and falling object protection
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have a payload of at least 2 tonnes and maximum of 6 tonnes
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have a crane with a reach of at least 3.5m and a lift capacity of at least 300kg at 3.5m reach
